name: Acorn Lantern
description: These adorable Acorn Lanterns are knit entirely in the round, from the bottom up, on dpns. The candle is embroidered on using a chain stitch. The bottom has been left open, so that they can stand independently and so the embroidery is easier to do. I hope they bring joy.
sizes_available: Height without handle: 2.5”/ 6cm, or desired size.
suggested_yarn: Patons North America Classic Wool Worsted
full_text: These adorable Acorn Lanterns are knit entirely in the round, from the bottom up, on dpns. The candle is embroidered on using a chain stitch. The bottom has been left open, so that they can stand independently and so the embroidery is easier to do. I hope they bring joy. Please make as many as you like and feel free to make them to sell :) To make a lantern with a real acorn lid click here! Praise For Acorn Lantern Very cute and quick knit. I absolutely love it! (Adente) What a perfect little lantern! (5kittens) Tiny scraps of yarn used. Very cute little lantern, just right for a mouse! (Bogwoppit) Lovely written pattern. Less than an hour to knit. (bikerhen) Cute little lantern. Good for decoration of all kind. (Saphiera) Scraps used- sweet little lantern. (thrsedge)
